name: unwarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows someone is not careful about possible risks and dangers: Personal information that is unwarily spoken over the phone can be recorded, stolen, and used. Plants that are unwarily exposed can be damaged by the lingering frost.
More examplesFewer examplesIf anyone unwarily draws in too close and hears the singing of the Sirens, his wife and children will never welcome him home again.She stared along the alley at the two men who were standing unwarily outlined in the glow of a streetlight.
